column1: Smoque BBQ////Warning: if you go near closing time
column2: just know that they do run out of many popular items. "Sorry folks
column3: we are out of Chicken" was posted when we arrived. By the time we ordered
column4: they had run out of sliced brisket and only had chopped brisket available. Also
column5: out of Peach Cobbler too. I wiped my tears away and ordered up some delicious cornbread instead.
